column.text: 流程定义简称(新增字段，用于手机端)

statements.statement:
SELECT A.*,B.name_ DEPLOY_NAME, B.DEPLOY_TIME_ DEPLOY_TIME FROM act_re_procdef A left join act_re_deployment B on A.DEPLOYMENT_ID_ = B.ID_ where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.keyWord??> and (A.NAME_ like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.keyWord)}%' or A.KEY_ like '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.keyWord)}' or A.ID_ = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.keyWord)}' or A.RESOURCE_NAME_ like '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.keyWord)}' or B.NAME_ like '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.keyWord)}' ) </#if>
<#if query.id??> and A.ID_ = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.ids??> <#assign idList = StringUtil.split(query.ids,",") /> and A.ID_ in ( <#list idList as id> '${StringUtil.escapeSql(id)}' <#if id_has_next> , </#if> </#list> ) </#if>
<#if query.name??> and A.NAME_ = '${query.name}' </#if>
<#if query.key??> and A.KEY_ = '${query.key}' </#if>
<#if query.resourceName??> and A.RESOURCE_NAME_ like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.resourceName)}%' </#if>
<#if query.dgrmResourceName??> and A.DGRM_RESOURCE_NAME_ like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.dgrmResourceName)}%' </#if>
<#if query.description??> and A.DESCRIPTION_ like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.description)}%' </#if>
<#if query.tenantId??> and A.TENANT_ID_ like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.tenantId)}%' </#if>
<#if query.deployCategory??> and B.CATEGORY_ like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.deployCategory)}%' </#if>
<#if query.category??> and A.CATEGORY_ like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.category)}%' </#if>
<#if query.sortField?? && query.sortOrder??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} <#else> order by A.Key_ ,A.version_ desc </#if> </#if>
